description:
The ninjas are revealed to be Kai and Monica, and Kai makes a shocking declaration. If he can’t defeat Kazuma, he’ll commit suicide! Will his determination let him finally beat Kazuma? And will he really go through with it if he loses?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Hate Things That Are Twisted!! Kai and Monica`s Teamwork!
Je n`aime pas les courbes ! Le tandem Kai et Monika !
Magatta Koto ga Daikirai!! Kai to Monica no Ninin Sankyaku
เกลียดอะไรงอๆ ที่สุด!! ไคกับโมนิก้าวิ่ง 3 ขา
曲がったことが大キライ!! 戒とモニカの二人三脚
